summary: This document is an overdraft notice from Fifth Third Bank addressed to Scio Verum Corporation, detailing an overdraft situation on their account. It outlines the account's balance, transactions leading to the overdraft, and provides instructions for avoiding further fees.

persons.name: Helene Tolent
persons.context: Helene Tolent is identified as the Relationship Manager for Scio Verum Corporation, indicating her role in managing the banking relationship.

persons.name: P. Brian Moore
persons.context: P. Brian Moore is mentioned as the Senior Vice President of Fifth Third Bank, signing the overdraft notice.

keyFacts: Scio Verum Corporation's account was overdrawn by $19,618.96 as of January 9, 2015.
Fifth Third Bank waived a $37.00 overdraft fee as a courtesy for this occurrence.
The notice urges Scio Verum Corporation to make a deposit by January 15, 2015, to avoid further fees.
The document outlines the account activity leading to the overdraft, including a $10,000 deposit and $25,192.49 in withdrawals.
The account had a beginning balance of $(4,426.47) on January 9, 2015.
